column4: hi all do you know how to use scanner under ubuntu? i plugged canon 3200f to usb port, it seems in device manager that it waqs recognized, but what to do now?
xsane under gimp couldn't find device
i dont think that is needed for scanning...
is that a scanner only or a multifunction thing (scan/print) ?
but it is visible in device manager
damn only as experimental, in cvs :/ http://www.sane-project.org/unsupported/canon-3200f.html
ok, i will try to run it
you have to compile it your sef
with luck it would be just a module/driver... but you could allso try to compile that thing only locally (like, not using "make install")
